name: Swim Deep Ludum Dare 48
description: Uses generic, unchanged Unity controls, so WASD, and arrow keys to move. You cannot move upward. You can slow your decent, but you will never get back to where you were. Survival is hard, and success is never guaranteed. There's a menu in-game that shows where the colliders are for the enemies. Didn't want them to be too small or too big, gave them a head, to about halfway through their body, except the angler.  My first game jam game, I hope you enjoy. Planning on adding more to it eventually and releasing it on Google Play.
